page.title: 17POPULATION AND HOUSING
page.content: Woodhall Spa is not close to any important centre of employment and nor does the village provide much employment itself.Surveys of the main wage earners in village households show that fewer than one quarter of them work within Woodhall Spa and many travel over 20 miles to work. These large distances together with poor public transport mean that most people in the village are car owners.Few people who do not own a car could think of living in the village due to its isolation from major facilities and jobs. Thus the population is largely middle class and wants high quality,expensive housing.Woodhall Spa has become one of the most expensive villages in Lincolnshire in which to live.Although the village is in a farming area few farm workers can afford to live in it.
